SEARCH
Package AppointmentSystem

Class AppointmentRecordViewer

Object
AppointmentRecordViewer
public class AppointmentRecordViewer extends Object
The ApptRecordViewer class provides functionalities to view appointment records. It supports operations for administrators, doctors, and general users to display records based on specific criteria.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Map<String,Appointment>
    appointmentRecords
    A map containing all appointment records, keyed by their appointment ID.
    private AppointmentOutcomeRecordController

    Controller to access and manage appointment outcome records.

    Scanner for user input.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentRecordViewer

      public AppointmentRecordViewer(Map<String,Appointment> appointmentRecords)
      Constructs a new ApptRecordViewer with the specified map of appointment records.
      Parameters:
      appointmentRecords - the map to manage and view appointment records

  • Method Details

    • viewAllRecords

      public void viewAllRecords()
      Displays all appointment records stored in the appointmentRecords map.

    • adminViewAllRecords

      public void adminViewAllRecords() throws IOException
      Displays all appointment records for administrative purposes. Only includes appointments of type Type.APPOINTMENT. Also displays related outcome records for each appointment.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while accessing outcome records

    • viewPendingRecords

      public void viewPendingRecords(String doctorId) throws IOException
      Displays all pending appointment records for a specific doctor. Excludes appointments of type Type.LEAVE.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the ID of the doctor whose pending records should be displayed
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during record access

    • viewRecordsById

      public Appointment viewRecordsById(String Id) throws IOException
      Displays appointment records by a specific ID. The ID can be an appointment ID or a patient ID.
      Parameters:
      Id - the ID to filter appointment records
      Returns:
      the Appointment object if found by appointment ID, otherwise null
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while accessing records
